ygData.subject: Re: Educating the masses
ygData.msgSnippet: Any spell that you have to target something can be targetted on yourself. Handy when trying to determine exactly what effect a song would have on a mob s
ygData.messageBody:
Any spell that you have to target something can be targetted on yourself.
Handy when trying to determine exactly what effect a song would have on a
mob's statistics. As for Bellow, each hit knocks the target back a little
bit at a time. I once knocked a gnoll guard in Paws off the first bridge
using it. I think someone else here mentioned bellowing Dvinn right out the
castle window.

Good Journey,

Sineras Silverlyre (Cazic-Thule)


8)-----Original Message-----

8)
8)
8)I dont have that song yet, what do you mean you blasted yourself off a
8)ledge? You casted it on yourself?
8)
8)Gediprime
8)Xegony
8)
8)> >I've also blasted myself off a ledge while rooted, using
8)Bellow. Bought
8)me

8)get at me again,
8)> >and hurt less than the pounding they were giving me.
8)> >
8)>

8)> <bow bow bow bows profusely> you are the man!
8)>

8)> Veeshan
